name: OpenAFS

projects.summary: OpenAFS is an open-source implementation of an Andrew File System, which provides a distributed file system solution for enhanced storage and access across networked systems.
The main goals of OpenAFS include improving file access performance, enhancing security features, and ensuring cross-platform compatibility for various operating systems.
